amendment.description: To require a report on a strategy for promoting stability and improving the quality of life in Somalia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2009 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2009 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To require a report on a strategy for promoting stability and improving the quality of life in Somalia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2009 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2009 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
